title: CHAPTER I THE HOUSE IN CHARLTON STREET

book.title: The Sapphire Signet
book.description: 简介： It was five o'clock and a very dull, dark afternoon in Charlton Street. One by one lights had twinkled out in all the little two-story-and-dormer-windowed houses on the block,in all but one. The parlor windows of this house were still unlit, but behi...
